results.title: Postman Pat & the toy soldiers
results.brief_description: Pat becomes the hero of the day following a break-in at Garner Hall. By inadvertently delivering a wrong parcel to Major Fobes, he manages to foil the thieves. Also includes “Pat’s Tractor Express” featuring Pat enlisting the help of Miss Hubbard and a tractor to deliver a registered letter across the country.

results.title: Postman Pat's secret
results.brief_description: More than just the man who delivers the mail, Postman Pat is a friend to all the people of Greendale. He always has a kind word and a joke for everyone, and he’s ready to help out when needed. His trusty companion Jess, the black and white cat, goes everywhere with him. This compilation of three stories consists of “Postman Pat’s finding day” showing Pat searching for Katy Pottage’s missing doll, “Postman Pat and the Magpie Hen” featuring a naughty hen who decides to ‘borrow’ the keys to Pat’s van and “Postman Pat’s Secret” though everyone knows that it’s Pat’s birthday.

results.title: Postman Pat's ABC
results.brief_description: Learn the ABC with Postman Pat. This story takes place in the little village of Greendale. Pat and his trusty companion Jess, the black and white cat, help young Tom Pottage to remember his alphabet. This delightful animation by Ivor Wood is an excellent aid for young children learning the alphabet.

results.title: Postman Pat's 123
results.brief_description: Learn to count with Postman Pat. Young Tom Pottage has difficulty learning to count. Postman Pat steps in to help young Tom learn his numbers. This film, narrated by Ken Barrie, is beautifully animated by Ivor Wood.

results.title: Posting Woomera
results.creator_credit: Australia. Army. Public Relations Film Unit
results.brief_description: A survey of the rocket research and testing being carried out at Woomera Rocket Range, South Australia. Housing, recreational activities and other amenities are also shown.

results.title: Posters
results.brief_description: Posters are made for people on the move. This video helps you to design eye catching and effective posters. make your own poster work for you with the technique of colour, letter spacing and design.

results.title: Poster for Laura Poitras’ Citizenfour
results.headline_credit: Germany, United Kingdom and United States, 2014
results.brief_description: Laura Poitras blurs the line between documentary and investigative journalism. Poitras was one of three journalists confided in by whistleblower Edward Snowden when he shared classified documents that detailed global government surveillance. Telling his story earned Poitras a Pulitzer, while Citizenfour won an Oscar.

results.title: Poster
results.creator_credit: Durrell R. Crays and Bailey Film Productions
results.brief_description: A poster sells a product or an idea. It has a single concept; it must be an instant visual communication to impress and motivate the viewer to act on the message. The greatest change in posters is movement - commercials on television are posters in motion. Shows numerous examples of traditional and modern posters.

results.title: Postcard from Tunis
results.brief_description: The central theme of ‘Postcard from Tunis’ is writing itself - its histories, its inscriptions and its relevance to the human-computer interface. This is explored in a personal, audiovisual portrait of Tunis, the home of my family-in-law. I designed and programmed the unique interface so that it echoes an actual visit, where you can’t help learning a few Tunisian words and with time, starting to read written Arabic. Although the work was designed for adults, children have shown a strong affinity with it.
